channel.title: Need Website developer
channel.description:
Hi Guys, i need a website developer who know what he is doing, to make the website for my server, and forum I Think i have all i need to do that ( domain, web hosting..) if need more i can buy it. My server is already done, 24/7 vps hosting and vote, donor system. Just need a website developer. Pm me, or add my skype : marcofaria123
Thanks

item.title: Need Website developer
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Pure_:

Because english examinations obviously correspond to grammatical skill. Are you 12?

It still counts towards the overall grade. Are you 10?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Website developer
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Ashi, post:1, topic:547046”][quote author=The Web Guy link=topic=665819.msg4451414#msg4451414 date=1411693903]
Alright, just a few suggestions, coming from a website developer…

[ul][li]First most, this is in the wrong section, this should be in Development Teams.[/li]
[li]I personally would not want to do work for someone who doesn’t have proper grammar, and doesn’t give a good description about the server.[/li]
[li]Rarely will you find decent website developers that will do work for free, if you do, consider yourself lucky. But keep in mind Moparscape doesn’t allow selling/buying products/services. Check out Runeserver if you’re looking to buy a website developer.[/li][/ul]

Post this in development teams, fix some grammar problems, and add some images/pictures about your server if you want a decent website developer.
[/quote]
This section is fine, for the most part.

Your second point is a little harsh, English may not be his first language. Dunno why ur being a grammar noob anyway, it’s not like you got an A* in your English exams.

There are many freelancers who do web design for free so that they can use it to build their portfolio. When you pay for a web designer, you’re usually thinking big projects.

Of course, if you want free work you aren’t going to get much more than a SMF install with a crappy theme thrown on top of it. Quality work isn’t cheap

There are actually some decent SMF themes out there. What’s wrong with SMF anyway? It’s good for what you get and making themes isn’t rocket science ;o[/quote]Because english examinations obviously correspond to grammatical skill. Are you 12?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Website developer
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Also, make sure you know exactly what you want your site to look like. Most developers are not designers, and if you happen to find one that is, they don’t do the extra work for free. Come up with some wireframes, sketch up certain components you want, etc.

Of course, if you want free work you aren’t going to get much more than a SMF install with a crappy theme thrown on top of it. Quality work isn’t cheap

Read full topic

item.title: Need Website developer
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Alright, just a few suggestions, coming from a website developer…

[ul][li]First most, this is in the wrong section, this should be in Development Teams.[/li]
[li]I personally would not want to do work for someone who doesn’t have proper grammar, and doesn’t give a good description about the server.[/li]
[li]Rarely will you find decent website developers that will do work for free, if you do, consider yourself lucky. But keep in mind Moparscape doesn’t allow selling/buying products/services. Check out Runeserver if you’re looking to buy a website developer.[/li][/ul]

Post this in development teams, fix some grammar problems, and add some images/pictures about your server if you want a decent website developer.

Read full topic
